channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise as U.S. Treasurys Sink on Deficit Concerns
item.description: Gold futures rose as U.S. Treasurys fell on deficit concerns.

item.title: The Best Way to Start Investing in Commodities, According to the Pros
item.description: Market professionals say a small allocation can provide diversification and a hedge against uncertainty.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Lose More Ground
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures added to yesterdayâ€™s losses with forecasts for a mild start to the winter heating season and higher production.

item.title: Solid U.S. Data Among Drivers of Higher 10-Year U.S. Treasury Yields
item.description: U.S. Treasurys continued to sell off, sending yields higher. Drivers include stronger-than-expected U.S. data, commodity price inflation, and recent s...

item.title: BP shares fall to lowest since 2022 after sharp drop in the oil major's third-quarter profit
item.description: British oil major BP on Tuesday reported its weakest quarterly earnings in nearly four years, weighed down by a slump in crude prices.

item.title: PayPal shares fall on revenue miss
item.description: PayPal reported better-than-expected third-quarter earnings on Tuesday, but revenue came in slightly below expectations.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Fall, With Earnings in Spotlight
item.description: U.S. stocks fell ahead of a slew of quarterly results from tech companies, including Google parent Alphabet, slated to report after the bell.

item.title: McDonald's reverses U.S. same-store sales declines in the third quarter, but E. coli fallout looms
item.description: Shares of McDonald's have fallen 6% since its Quarter Pounder burgers were linked to a deadly E. coli outbreak.

item.title: Pfizer tops earnings estimates, hikes full-year guidance as Covid products help sales
item.description: It is a critical quarterly report for Pfizer, which is grappling with activist pressure from Starboard Value.

item.title: What to know about the new way Microsoft will report cloud numbers Wednesday
item.description: Some on Wall Street are upbeat about the move. Others are not.
